document.full_text: if there was any doubt whether the new show "the voice" on u.s. network nbc and "american idol" would be at each other's proverbial throats, "voice" coach adam levine made sure of it on this week's episode.
document.title: randy jackson says "the voice" is "gimmicky"
lines_and_colors: if there was any doubt whether the new show "the voice" on u.s. network nbc and "american idol" would be at each other's proverbial throats, "voice" coach adam levine made sure of it on this week's episode.
